title: Reckless (Bryan Adams album)
summary: Reckless is the fourth studio album by Canadian singer-songwriter Bryan Adams. Released on 5 November 1984 by A&M Records, the album was co-produced by Adams and Bob Clearmountain, and is considered Adams' most successful solo album. The album has reached 12 million album sales worldwide.[5] It was the first Canadian album to sell more than a million copies within Canada.[6] The album reached number 1 on the Billboard 200 and reached high positions on album charts worldwide.[7]
